1305000.name: Kingdom Karnage
1305000.description:
Kingdom Karnage is a cross-platform, animated combat, trading card game. It's available to play on PC, Android, and Apple iOS.

Equip a deck of 25 cards from varying rarities (Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic, Legendary) which you take into battle. Reduce the enemy hero’s health to zero while protecting your own hero and claim victory!

Team up with your friends to take down the dungeon boss in awesome 3 vs 1 PvE dungeons. Turn on your fellow man in real-time PvP battles. Use spells and abilities to turn the tide of battle for your troops.

Compete
Compete in regular tournaments for cash & character prizes. Balanced tournaments with pre-set decks will mean newer players can quickly compete with old veterans.

Trade
Trade in our in-game auction house! Nearly every item can be traded, making this a true play-and-earn experience. Sell your latest dungeon loot or purchase that rare armour piece you need to complete your set. Are your items too precious to sell? Boost your income by renting items to other players.

Hoard your riches!
Stash the KKT you earn in King Midas’ Vault and earn extra rewards each month for voting on game topics. Access your KKT whenever you want, no time limits or withdrawal fees apply.

Always something to do!
Enjoy our events all year round. Non-stop weekend events ensure there is always something interesting going on. Massive seasonal events introduce exclusive characters, dungeons, and rewards.

Sign up today, completely free to play!
1305000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
